content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a furnace used to convert iron ore into iron plates.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position (-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of a furnace used to convert copper ore into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities API misuse – Avoid supplying unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments. Always match the expected parameter signature.
• Lab placement and crafting – Repeated failures to place or craft a Lab indicate that the required inventory item is missing and that the result from get_entities can be None. Ensure the availability of Lab items and validate that lists are non-null before iteration.
• Resource chain shortcomings – Crafting errors for Lab subcomponents (iron‑gear‑wheel, electronic‑circuit, copper‑cable) show that prerequisite resources are insufficient. Verify that your resource production chain (including proper smelting and component production) is fully supported before attempting complex builds.
